page.title: 03OAKENGATES HEALTH FACILITIES
page.content:
Oakengates Dental Practice. ___________________________ The dentist is the biggest one in the area. 11 people work there. Mr. Easton, the dentist, who examines about 200 people during the 6 days he works each week. He has worked elsewhere but he likes Oakengates most. He came to Oakengates because it has a good sized population although only 50% go to the dentist.
Charlton Street Doctors. ________________________ The building was opened in 1965 and has 12 rooms and a flat above. There are: 6 secretaries,6 doctors and 3 nurses. Between 8.30am and 6pm they see from 30-100 people although the doctors are on call 24 hours. Some people come to see the doctors from Wellington.
